resources.string: Deeply malted and caramel apparent with overtones of chocolate and a mild, smoky flavor. A complex beer that is light on the palette and easy drinking.
Assertive hop bitterness, a toasty and bready malt mouth-feel with a rye grass and citrus finish.
Rich and medium bodied with a subtle blend of caramel malts that give way to a well-balanced bouquet of cascade hops.
